trans-unit.source: Provides managed to unmanaged interoperation support for creating image objects.
trans-unit.target: Ger stöd för hanterade till ohanterade interoperation för att skapa image-objekt.

trans-unit.source: This class provides creation mechanisms for the primary bitmap imaging class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen innehåller skapa mekanismer för primära bitmappen imaging klassen i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: This includes methods that create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> based on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objects , and memory sections.
trans-unit.target: Det innehåller metoder för att skapa en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>baserat på [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objekt och minne avsnitt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: Returns a managed <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>, based on the provided pointer to an unmanaged bitmap and palette information.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en hanterad <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>, baserat på angivna pekaren till ohanterad bitmappen och paletten information.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged bitmap.
trans-unit.target: En pekare till ohanterad bitmapp.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the bitmap's palette map.
trans-unit.target: En pekare till den bitmappen paletten karta.

trans-unit.source: The size of the source image.
trans-unit.target: Storleken på källbilden.

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that specifies how to handle conversions.
trans-unit.target: Ett värde som anger hur du hanterar konverteringar uppräkningen.

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den skapade <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a managed <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>, based on the provided pointer to an unmanaged icon image.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en hanterad <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>, baserat på den angivna pekaren till en ohanterad ikon.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged icon source.
trans-unit.target: En pekare till ohanterad ikonen källa.

trans-unit.source: The size of the source image.
trans-unit.target: Storleken på källbilden.

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that specifies how to handle conversions.
trans-unit.target: Ett värde som anger hur du hanterar konverteringar uppräkningen.

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den skapade <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a managed <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>, based on the provided unmanaged memory location.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en hanterad <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>, baserat på den angivna ohanterade minnesplatsen.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a memory section.
trans-unit.target: En pekare till ett minne-avsnitt.

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the width, in pixels, of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Ett heltal som anger bredden i bildpunkter för bitmappen.

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the height, in pixels, of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Ett heltal som anger höjden i pixlar på bitmappen.

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Ett värde för uppräkningen.

trans-unit.source: The stride of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Stride på bitmappen.

trans-unit.source: The byte offset into the memory stream where the image starts.
trans-unit.target: Byteförskjutning i dataströmmen minne där avbildningen startas.

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den skapade <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>.
